text: [Bing gei nimen paiqianle] yi wei shizhe [mu sheng], ta [mu sheng] xiang nimen xuandu an la de qishi,[na qishi] chanming wanshi wanwu, yibian ta shi xinyang bing xingshan zhe cong hei'an [ru bu xinyang an la he duo shen chongbai] zouxiang guangming [yisilan jiao]. Shei xinyang an la bing xingshan, ta [an la] bi shi shei jinru zhu heliuguo de leyuan, yong ju qizhong. An la que yi ci gei ta youmei de jiyang.
